biotools.summary: EndHic is a fast and easy-to-use Hi-C scaffolding tool, using the Hi-C links from contig end regions instead of whole contig regions to assemble large contigs into chromosomal-level scaffolds.

bioschemas.name: EndHiC
bioschemas.summary: EndHic is a fast and easy-to-use Hi-C scaffolding tool, using the Hi-C links from contig end regions instead of whole contig regions to assemble large contigs into chromosomal-level scaffolds.
